body:
Hi, I was wondering if anyone has read or watched Attack of Titan. I'm wondering as I don't know if its worth the time or money to see it. What reviews dose it have, people like it or not?

Thanks
body_tagged:
Hi, I was wondering if anyone has read or watched Attack of Titan. I'm wondering as I don't know if its worth the time or money to see it. What reviews dose it have, people like it or not?

Thanks
title: Attack on Titan

replies.body: It is one of my favorite anime. I highly recommend it. Just a heads up, it is very bloody and what not :P
replies.body_tagged: It is one of my favorite anime. I highly recommend it. Just a heads up, it is very bloody and what not :P

replies.body:
I've only seen the first 4 episodes but it's great so far - gets right into the action. There's a little drama and some humor.
As D00ZiE said there's blood and stuff but you'll get used to it ;)
replies.body_tagged:
I've only seen the first 4 episodes but it's great so far - gets right into the action. There's a little drama and some humor.
As D00ZiE said there's blood and stuff but you'll get used to it ;)

replies.body: I've been told it's better to get the one with scrip but, is that true , I don't know.

replies.body:
Isn;t it Attack On Titan?


IMO, ya it is worthwhile to watch. It is super epic and it deserver's its HYPE to an extent but in general, one of the best anime's Just watch this :)

replies.body: Yes but where can I find it?
replies.body_tagged: Yes but where can I find it?

reply_to.body: get dubbed, the 2nd half of the dubbed episodes will release in september
reply_to.body_tagged: get dubbed, the 2nd half of the dubbed episodes will release in september

replies.body:
I use Crunchyroll. They have it subbed (much better than dubbed imo) but there's a TON of ads unless you pay. But, it's totally worth it since it gives me time for potty breaks and forum checks, lol.
Just search up 'Crunchyroll' and search 'Attack on Titan' in the website search bar. It shouldn't be too hard.

Have a great time watching!
